component.name: NetXMS
component.summary: Desktop client for NetXMS - network monitoring system

description.p: NetXMS is an enterprise grade multi-platform modular open source network management and monitoring system.
It provides comprehensive event management, performance monitoring, alerting, reporting and graphing for all layers of IT infrastructure â€” from network devices to business application layer.
Having been designed with flexibility and scalability in mind, NetXMS features a wide range of supported platforms.

Fixed custom attribute conflict propagation and conflict removal
Fixed agent crash on empty output from external table provider
Fixed bug in pin/popup agent file view
New agent metrics System.CurrentTime.ISO8601.Local, System.CurrentTime.ISO8601.UTC, and System.TimeZoneOffset
Bundled zlib updated to latest version
Print exception trace replaced by error logging
Disable walk action on root object in mib browser
Business service polls can be disabled or will not be executed if object is unmanaged
